downloadDescription: Download this macro-enabled Word document to see a gallery of built-in icons available for solution development.
detailsSection:
When opened, this Word document adds two groups to the Office Backstage view with icon galleries of built-in icons available for reuse in your solutions.

Use these icons in your Ribbon solutions by specifying the imageMso value for your controls. For example, <button id="myButton" label="My save" imageMso="FileSave" /> creates a button with the Save icon.
systemRequirementsSection:
• This download works with the following Office applications:
    • Microsoft Office 2010 Editions
    • Microsoft Word 2010
Note This add-in is for use with Microsoft Office 2010. It will not work with earlier versions.
installInstructionSection:
To install this download:
  1. Download the file by clicking the Download link (above) and saving the file to your hard disk.
  2. Double-click the Office2010IconsGallery.docx.
  3. Click Enable Editing.
  4. Click File to go to the Backstage view. ImageMSO 0 and ImangeMSO 1 appear after the Exit button.
  5. Click to view the icons.

Instructions for use:
Once you have installed this download, use Word as you normally would. The Office Icon Gallery appears on the Office Backstage view when this document is open.

Remove of this download:
There is no removal feature for this download.
